T=input()
while T:
      T-=1
      n,m=[int(x) for x in raw_input().split()]
      while n:
            n-=1
            arr2=[]
            arr=raw_input()
            for i in arr:
                  arr2.append(i)
            for i in range (0,len(arr2)/2):
                  c=arr2[len(arr2)-i-1]
                  arr2[len(arr2)-1-i]=arr[i]
                  arr2[i]=c
            print "".join(arr2)
